local_intent: Perceive white_plate, compute top grasp, approach and align, close gripper with force 20, verify grasp stability.
assumptions: white_plate is visible to the camera
gripper is initially open or will be opened
coherence_with_global: Consistent with GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: opens gripper, detects white_plate, computes a top grasp, approaches with tolerance 0.005, closes gripper with force 20, and verifies stability.
